FedConnect

FedConnect is a web portal that bridges the gap between agencies and vendors to streamline the process of doing business with the federal government. It is a one stop location where you can find opportunities for federal contracts, grants, and other types of assistance funding. Through this portal, you will be able to review opportunities and receive awards. Youâ€™ll also have an open channel of communication with the government that is both secure and auditable where you can ask questions, submit responses, acknowledge receipt of documents, and receive awards. You can even create teams within
FedConnect to manage your response or award. https://www.fedconnect.net/Fedconnect/
